comment.author: 67192982@N07
comment._content: This photo seems surreal with the contrast between the prairie grass and the tall tufty trees.

comment.author: 52529054@N06
comment._content: Thanks for your comment, Mara.  Yes, it does seem surreal, almost like a Dr. Seuss landscape!  A number of the photos from Bender's trip to South America have this quality -- not only because it is a landscape our eyes are not accustomed to, but also because we see displaced Mennonites inhabiting the landscape.
